segments.text: How do we do timesheets here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They are actually fairly straightforward . Do you know where the blanks are kept ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , well after you take one out of that second drawer , you put your name on the top . Do you see ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Next you fill in all of your hours for each day and total them . Do you know how to show time on a 24 - hour clock ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Midnight is zero and when you put the minutes in , make sure that you show them with a dot followed by the minutes . Do you understand ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I have no idea what you are talking about .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's easy , just write in the hours , total it , sign it , and put it in the box .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Try it and if you can't do it , one of us can always help you later .
segments.speaker: S2
